mapper.sql: id, name, role_type, remark, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_role (id, name, role_type, remark, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update.foreach:
update sys_role
name = #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_type = #{item.roleType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
remark = #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_by = #{item.createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
